GR14sadhdipu:9: be worth finding other manuscripts in order to produce a true critical edition.]

GR14sadhdipu:6299: vaiṣṇavaṃ jñāna-vaktāraṃ yo vidyād viṣṇuvad gurum /
GR14sadhdipu:6300: pūjayed vāṅ-manaḥ-kāyaiḥ sa śāstrajñaḥ sa vaiṣṇavaḥ //
GR14sadhdipu:6301: śloka-pādasya vaktāpi yaḥ pūjyaḥ sa sadaiva hi /
GR14sadhdipu:6302: kiṃ punar bhagavad-viṣṇoḥ svarūpaṃ vitanoti yaḥ // ity ādi /
GR14sadhdipu:6310: madhu-lobhād yathā bhṛṅgaḥ puṣpāt puṣpāntaraṃ vrajet /
GR14sadhdipu:6311: jñāna-lobhāt tathā śiṣyo guror gurv-antaraṃ vrajet //
GR14sadhdipu:6314: yuva-dvandvaṃ tac cet paricartium ārād abhilaṣeḥ /
GR14sadhdipu:6315: svarūpaṃ śrī-rūpaṃ sa-gaṇam iha tasyāgrajam api
GR14sadhdipu:6316: sphuṭaṃ premṇā nityaṃ smara nama tadā tvaṃ śṛṇu manaḥ //
GR14sadhdipu:6324: ata etādṛśānugatyaṃ vinā śrī-nandanandanasya tathāvidha-svarūpa-prāptir na
GR14sadhdipu:6325: bhavati tatrāpi śrī-rūpānugatyaṃ vinā śrī-rādhā-kṛṣṇātula-bhajana-ratnaṃ na
GR14sadhdipu:6329: ācinoti yaḥ śāstrārthān svācāraiḥ sthāpayaty api /
GR14sadhdipu:6330: svayam ācarate yasmāt tasmād ācārya ucyate //
GR14sadhdipu:6337: na japo nārcanaṃ naiva dhyānaṃ nāpi vidhi-kramaḥ /
GR14sadhdipu:6340: nāyikānāṃ ca sarvāsāṃ madhyā śreṣṭhatamā matā /
GR14sadhdipu:6341: prāyaḥ sarva-rasotkarṣo madhyāyām eva yujyate // ity ādi /
GR14sadhdipu:6346: na dātavyā na prakāśyā jane tv anadhikāriṇi //
GR14sadhdipu:6348: māṃ ca gopaya yena syāt sṛṣṭir eṣottarottarā / iti /
GR14sadhdipu:6358: [*ENDNOTE #2] viśākhe / idam api alpam etat tat śṛṇu /
GR14sadhdipu:6361: vayasyasya sakala-gokula-patitvena govindābhiṣeka-mahotsavaḥ kasya vā garvaṃ na
GR14sadhdipu:6363: [*ENDNOTE #3] The actual lines from Mukundāṣṭakam are priyam iva kila
GR14sadhdipu:6364: varṇaṃ rāga-yuktaṃ priyāyāḥ praṇayatu mama netrābhīṣṭa-pūrtiṃ mukundaḥ //
GR14sadhdipu:6365: [*ENDNOTE #4] These are two lines of a śārdūla-vikrīḍita verse. The rest is not
GR14sadhdipu:6366: found in the text. The source of these verses is unknown at this time.
GR14sadhdipu:6372: [*ENDNOTE #10] The readings on these verses are at quite great variance from the
GR14sadhdipu:6373: edition of Bṛhad-bhāgavatāmṛtam I have in my possession.
GR14sadhdipu:6374: [*ENDNOTE #11] Haridas Shastri cites the following verse interpolated here:
GR14sadhdipu:6377: [*ENDNOTE #12] This verse is not found in BhaktiS. Padma-purāṇa 5.82.8.
